name: Rived Code
description:
A game about the player getting in his own code-and somehow it is rived...

I made Rived Code for the Mini Game Jam #74: Chaos, which lasted three days. I hope you like the result.

The limitation of the jam was "Only use specified keys." The keys were A,X,Spacebar,B,P and 8, so dont be suprised about the controls ;)

I probably am going to release more levels and additions in the future.

Len Underbrink Devs.
